snippet.title: EvilVEvil - Official Leon Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description:
Meet the vampire Leon in this latest EvilVEvil trailer. Watch as Leon takes on skeleton-like demons and brutally tears one apart in this cinematic trailer for the first-person shooter game. Live out your ultimate vampire power fantasy as you carve, bite, and shoot a path through evil when EvilVEvil launches on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X/S on July 16, 2024.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
